channel.title: Networking Index on My Tech Knowledge Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Networking Index on My Tech Knowledge Notes

item.title: Phase 1 : Core networking concepts
item.description:
1️⃣ What Is a Network?

Simple definition:

A network is a group of devices that can communicate with each other.

Examples of devices:

  • Laptop
  • Phone
  • Server
  • Printer
  • Router

“If devices can send and receive data, they are on a network.”

Real-life analogy

Think of a network like a postal system:

  • Houses = devices
  • Addresses = IP addresses
  • Letters = data
  • Post office = router

2️⃣ What Is a Host?

Definition:

A host is any device that can send or receive data on a network.
